basic.startNodeRequired: Workflow must have exactly one start node
basic.startNodeCountError: Workflow can only have one start node, currently has {{count}} start nodes
basic.endNodeRequired: Workflow must have exactly one end node
basic.endNodeCountError: Workflow can only have one end node, currently has {{count}} end nodes

connectivity.startNodeNoOutput: Start node cannot have no output edges
connectivity.endNodeNoInput: End node cannot have no input edges
connectivity.nodeNoConnection: {{nodeType}} node cannot have no input or output edges

exclusive.noInputEdge: Exclusive gateway "{{nodeName}}" cannot have no input edges
exclusive.noOutputEdge: Exclusive gateway "{{nodeName}}" cannot have no output edges
exclusive.sourceNodeCannotBeEnd: Exclusive gateway "{{nodeName}}" source node "{{sourceNodeName}}" cannot be an end node type

fieldPermission.infoComponentReadOnly: Info component "{{key}}" can only be set to hidden or read-only
fieldPermission.startNodeNeedInputField: Start node "{{nodeName}}" field permissions must have at least one input field
fieldPermission.autoTitleMustHidden: When auto-generating title, start node "{{nodeName}}" must set title field to hidden
fieldPermission.nodeNeedNonHiddenField: Node "{{nodeName}}" field permissions must have at least one non-hidden field

form.rowComponentNoChildren: Row component cannot have no child components
form.titleComponentCountError: Form must have exactly one title component (type="title"), currently has {{count}} title components

hook.hookUrlRequired: Hook node "{{nodeName}}" must fill in hook URL
hook.hookTokenRequired: Hook node "{{nodeName}}" must fill in hook token
hook.needInputEdge: Hook node "{{nodeName}}" must have at least one input edge, currently has {{count}} input edges
hook.onlyOneOutputEdge: Hook node "{{nodeName}}" can only have one output edge, currently has {{count}} output edges
hook.outputEdgeCannotBeSelf: Hook node "{{nodeName}}" output edge target node cannot be itself

normal.assigneeTypeRequired: Normal node "{{nodeName}}" must set assignee type
normal.assignmentStrategyRequired: Normal node "{{nodeName}}" must set assignment strategy

parallel.convergenceNodeNotNormal: Parallel node "{{nodeName}}" output edges eventually converge to node "{{convergenceNodeName}}" which is not a normal node type
parallel.noConvergenceNode: Parallel node "{{nodeName}}" output edges have no convergence node found

timer.needInputEdge: Timer node "{{nodeName}}" must have at least one input edge, currently has {{count}} input edges
timer.onlyOneOutputEdge: Timer node "{{nodeName}}" can only have one output edge, currently has {{count}} output edges
timer.outputEdgeCannotBeSelf: Timer node "{{nodeName}}" output edge target node cannot be itself

edge.conditionGroupRequired: Condition edge "{{edgeName}}" must set condition groups
